name: Skype Integration
description: Integrated Skype features: use shell notifications, add search provider to find Skype contacts, add Skype menu button that displays the current online presence and more. (Make sure you have the D-Bus Python Bindings installed; starting from Skype version 4.3.0.37, it is necessary to manually propagate setting changes by going to Options > Notifications > Contact Came Online and pressing Apply.)
